description: This file defines ConversationAdapter, a class that renders ConversationItem instances into a ListView, supporting multiple view types for different roles (USER and ASSISTANT). It manages view inflation, view holder pattern, and binds message data to UI components.

classes.name: ConversationAdapter
classes.description: An adapter that renders conversation items into a ListView with support for multiple view types.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Returns the number of conversation items.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Retrieves the conversation item at the specified position.

methods.name: getItemId
methods.description: Returns a stable ID for the item at the specified position.

methods.name: getViewTypeCount
methods.description: Returns the number of distinct view types (2).

methods.name: getItemViewType
methods.description: Determines the view type for a given position based on the role.

methods.name: getView
methods.description: Creates or reuses a view for a specific position, binding message text to the view.
